channel.title: Help for making command need a stat for getting

item.title: Help for making command need a stat for getting
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“0wn3d f0r 3v3r, post:4, topic:143113”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=196328.msg1779935#msg1779935 date=1190751558]
1st, you messed up your code tags…

2nd, isn’t that wrong lol? not 100% sure but i am like 30% sure it is…

Shouldn’t it be like?..

if (command.startsWith("def") && (playerLevel[3] >= 99))
			{
                		addItem(10712, 1);
                		addItem(10711, 1);
                		addItem(10232, 1);
                		addItem(11268, 1);
		             addItem(11265, 1);
		}
                         else
		{
			sendMessage("99 Def To Get this!");
		}
}

[/quote]

his is just a different version… so don’t be acting like you know everything -.-[/quote]

Oh my bad for helping. You really didn’t need

if (playerLevel[3] < 99)

Just one word 

else

Well in future, i wont help. But that shortens it down IMO. And tbh i dont really care what you think. I would have used mine, less client.java space ;)… Remember, every word counts. Lol, and i can admit, i dont know everything, thanks for pointing it out… But im learning, like you did/still are…

Read full topic
item.source: Help for making command need a stat for getting

item.title: Help for making command need a stat for getting
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_f0r_3v3r 0wn3d f0r 3v3r
item.description:
@0wn3d_f0r_3v3r wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:3, topic:143113”]1st, you messed up your code tags…

2nd, isn’t that wrong lol? not 100% sure but i am like 30% sure it is…

Shouldn’t it be like?..

if (command.startsWith("def") && (playerLevel[3] >= 99)) { addItem(10712, 1); addItem(10711, 1); addItem(10232, 1); addItem(11268, 1); addItem(11265, 1); } else { sendMessage("99 Def To Get this!"); } } [/quote]

his is just a different version… so don’t be acting like you know everything -.-

Read full topic

			{
                		addItem(10712, 1);

			sendMessage("99 Def To Get this!");

}

item.title: Help for making command need a stat for getting
item.dc:creator: @MonkeyMad MonkeyMad
item.description:
@MonkeyMad wrote:

[code][code]if (command.startsWith(“def”) && (playerLevel[3] >= 99))
{
addItem(10712, 1);
addItem(10711, 1);
addItem(10232, 1);
addItem(11268, 1);
addItem(11265, 1);
if (playerLevel[3] < 99);
{
sendMessage(“99 Def To Get this!”);
}
}
if that dont work
add else in front of the if

and this is an example for def ^^! (NEEDS siLABs client o.o)[/code]l[/code]

Read full topic
